title: Dolly Parton Health Crisis Forces Her to Miss Dollywood Event – Fans in Panic
shortdescription: Doctors order country icon to 'take it easy' – sparks retirement fears.
author: Gossip Guru

content.content: /images/Dolly Parton Health Crisis Forces Her to Miss Dollywood Event.webp
Dolly Parton has canceled all upcoming appearances — including her own Dollywood Hall of Fame induction — after doctors ordered her to 'take it easy' due to an undisclosed health issue.
The 79-year-old legend posted a heartfelt video apologizing to fans, visibly emotional. Sources close to Dolly say she’s been battling exhaustion and complications from a previous surgery.
